price: 63. Y si le dan la espalda (a la verdad), (que sepan que) Al-lah conoce bien a los corruptores (que abandonan la verdad por la falsedad y obran mal).
arabic: فَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلِيمُۢ بِٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: fa-in tawallaw fa-inna al-laha ʿalīmun bil-muf'sidīna
